item.title: Road holding water massive puddle, 16th December
item.description:
Left hand side driving from Cheltenham to Elmbridge court direction, road continues to have drainage problems and holds water since resurfacing works. Road not fit for purpose never used to flood prior to re-surfacing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Elmbridge, Gloucester

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 16th December
item.description:
150mm depth, 750mm long, 650mm wide. You can see the traffic light wires inside. Edges are crumbled. The carriageway around it is cracked up.
Report on FixMyStreet
